import classname from 'classnames/bind'; import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import { Carousel, Typography, Card, Avatar, Button, Row, Col } from 'antd'; import styles from './Home.module.scss'; import ButtonComponent from '../../components/ButtonComponent/ButtonComponent'; import FeatureItemComponent from '../../components/FeatureItemComponent/FeatureItemComponent'; const cx = classname.bind(styles); const { Title, Text } = Typography; function Home() { const carouselRef = useRef(null); // Ref để điều khiển Carousel const testimonialsData = [ { id: 1, avatar: 'https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2015/10/05/22/37/blank-profile-picture-973460_1280.png', // Thay bằng URL ảnh của John Fang name: 'John Fang', website: 'wordfaang.com', content: 'Suspendisse ultrices at diam lectus nullam. Nisl, sagittis viverra enim erat tortor ultricies massa turpis. Arcu pulvinar aenean nam laoreet nulla. Quisque aliquet nulla quis est volutpat, ac vehicula sapien egestas. Maecenas vel lorem in nisi dignissim tristique. Praesent ac justo vel arcu facilisis rhoncus. Vestibulum sed ipsum id ipsum ultrices elementum. Integer nec lectus at libero bibendum volutpat. Integer id nunc vitae arcu consectetur cursus.', }, { id: 2, avatar: 'https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/08/30/12/45/girl-2696947_1280.jpg', // Ảnh khác name: 'Jane Doe', website: 'janedoe.com', content: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.', }, { id: 3, avatar: 'https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2020/07/01/12/58/icon-5360982_1280.png', // Ảnh khác name: 'Peter Jones', website: 'peterjones.net', content: 'Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.', }, ]; const goToPrev = () => { carouselRef.current.prev(); }; const goToNext = () => { carouselRef.current.next(); }; return (

Save your data storage here.

Data Warehouse is a data storage area that has been tested for security, so you can store your data here safely but not be afraid of being stolen by others.

We are a high-level data storage bank

The place to store various data that you can access at any time through the internet and where you can carry it. This very flexible storage area has a high level of security. To enter into your own data you must enter the password that you created when you registered in this Data Warehouse

Features

Some of the features and advantages that we provide for those of you who store data in this Data Warehouse.

Testimonials

{/* Các chấm chỉ báo dưới cùng */}
{testimonialsData.map((_, index) => ( // Bạn có thể thêm logic để active dot dựa trên slide hiện tại của Carousel // Hardcoded active for first dot, adjust based on Carousel's active index ))}
); } export default Home;
